Core Features That Drive Loyalty

Everything you need to turn first-time customers into regulars — without complexity.

Digital Stamp Cards

Replace paper stamp cards with a simple digital system customers love.

UPI Payment Verification

Automatically verify payments via UPI screenshots or transaction data.

Rewards & Redemptions

No App for Customers

Easy Setup

Get started in minutes. No hardware, no training, no complexity.

How Stampi Works

A simple 3-step flow that turns payments into repeat customers.

Step 1

Customer Pays

Customer pays via UPI, scans your QR code, and uploads the payment screenshot.

Step 2

Stamp Added

Stampi verifies the payment screenshot and adds a digital stamp automatically.

Step 3

Reward Earned

Customer redeems rewards and happily comes back again.

Built for Local Businesses

Stampi is designed to help local businesses build customer loyalty in a simple, practical, and stress-free way.

Increase Repeat Customers

Turn one-time visitors into loyal customers with a simple digital stamp system that encourages repeat visits.

No App for Customers

Customers don’t need to install anything. They simply scan your QR and upload their payment screenshot.

Built for Every Kind of Shop

From restaurants and cafés to salons, grocery stores, and retail shops, Stampi works seamlessly without hardware or complicated setup.

Clear Business Insights

Easily manage customers and rewards, track monthly sales numbers, and understand customer activity — all from one simple dashboard.

Secure & Reliable

Payment verification and stamp tracking are handled securely, so you can focus on running your business.
